metadata.title: CVE-2015-3878 on Ubuntu 14.04 LTS (trusty) - low
metadata.description: Media Projection in Android 5.x before 5.1.1 LMY48T and 6.0 before2015-10-01 allows attackers to bypass an intended screen-recording warningfeature and obtain sensitive screen-snapshot information via a craftedapplication that references a long application name, aka internal bug23345192.

criterions.comment: android: while related to the CVE in some way, a decision has been made to ignore this issue.
